attributes.action: change the current laws regarding the sale of anti-Semitic paraphernalia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created to show support from Jewish and non Jewish communities in banning the sale of anti-Semitic paraphernalia in UK shops and UK based websites. Current UK laws provide a loophole for the sale of certain anti-Semitic items, (such as T-shirts, posters etc) which provide no further purpose than to incite racial hatred. Please sign the petition.
